project-chrono-study.title: Chrono Study
project-chrono-study.description: Helps time and organize your studies. You can add subjects and view study statistics through charts and tables.

project-dispatch-system.title: Dispatch System
project-dispatch-system.description: Import contacts from Excel and send messages to them via WhatsApp.

project-dlav.title: D'Lav

project-gestao-clinica.description: Robust system for managing clinics with scheduling, registration, management, and payment features.

project-osc-manager.title: OSC Manager
project-osc-manager.description: Project management for NGOs. Visualize, analyze, and track projects.

project-pesquisa-satisfacao.title: Satisfaction Survey
project-pesquisa-satisfacao.description: Manages surveys and generates charts with summarized results.

project-reunioes.title: Meeting System
project-reunioes.description: Complete meeting system. Manage and create meetings. Generate minutes, agendas, and actions for each user.

project-saulo-imoveis.title: Saulo Real Estate
project-saulo-imoveis.description: Developed to showcase the finest luxury properties in Fortaleza.

project-vacation-plan.title: Vacation Plan
project-vacation-plan.description: See your friends' vacations and organize them on the calendar.

project-viu-ganhou.title: Watch and Earn
project-viu-ganhou.description: Watch ads and complete tasks to earn money and withdraw in cryptocurrencies.
